price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߋߟߊ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߯ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߢߐ߯ߡߍߡߛߏ ߟߊߕߏ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߡߌ߲߬ ߟߏ߲
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
